channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: My siblings don’t earn nearly as much as me. Should my parents leave me less money in their will?
item.description: “I’m concerned that my parents are going to strike me from any will.”

item.title: Why Elon Musk’s $1 trillion pay package got a ‘no’ from Norway.
item.description: Norway’s sovereign wealth fund, one of the biggest investors in Tesla, is opposing a plan to award Elon Musk up to $1 trillion in pay. But historicall...

item.title: Michael Burry challenges the AI trade with big short bets on Nvidia and Palantir
item.description: Michael Burry, hedge fund manager of “The Big Short” fame, is calling the top in two of the stock market’s favorite plays — and somewhat contradicting...

item.title: ‘She got divorced 4 years ago’: My friend, 72, has COPD. She has one son. Does she need to write a will?
item.description: “He is already on her bank accounts.”

item.title: Biotech stocks are coming back. Here’s what’s driving the sector higher.
item.description: The volatile sector is seeing greater stability, and these four stocks can profit.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
